project_description:
OpeReady provides software solutions that make the management of employee compliance, checkpoint efficiency and on the job training simple.

For this project, I created a responsive WordPress theme using Bootstrap and media queries.

I used the headroom.js plugin to bring the nav bar into view when appropriate, and give focus to the content the rest of the time.

Simulants are inert, non hazardous replica IEDs, Explosives, Detonators, Weapons, Firearms and Drugs used for threat detection training and testing.

I designed & created a responsive WordPress theme with the help of Bootstrap and modernizr to showcase the different Simulants products.

By using WordPress, I was able to create a website that is easy for the marketing team to update with new products.

This website was created to highlight the features and tests included in Pre-M, Renful’s pre-employment test for x-ray screeners.

I created a single page website using bootstrap and enhanced it with scroll up and tab features that were created using jQuery.

The Caradoc is a new company that designs beautiful leather stationery for organized living.

For this project, I created a coming soon page based on their design. I am currently developing an ecommerce website using wooCommerce so that they can sell their stationery online expected July 2015.

X-Ray Screener contains a number of my articles about x-ray security and profiling. It is used by x-ray screeners throughout the world to improve their knowledge and understanding of security concepts.

For this project, I created a custom WordPress theme that allows the user to add new articles easily.

I created the website for Claude Guillaume, a nutritional therapist in West London who had just graduated from university and wanted to promote her services online.

I designed a new responsive WordPress Theme with custom content types.

I also created a user manual to ensure my client is able to add and remove content easily.
